description:
A week earlier, after murdering Tonda in the entryway oof her own home, her killer ran into "Ramen Ogura." The police have narrowed the suspects down to three regulars of the shop: Shono, Mizushina, and Nakanishi. After the incident, Yumi ran into her ex-boyfriend Haneda, who says he heard a strange noise every time the culprit took a step. Upon hearing Haneda`s story, Conan realizes something. He and Sera search the water tank of the store`s toilet, solve the mystery behind the reason the culprit was swinging a hose around after committing the crime, determine the reason they`ve continued to visit the shop, and close in on the truth...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des ramen à tomber raide mort (2e partie)
死ぬほど美味いラーメン2 (後編)
